relation: A SPARCstorage Array controller or an individual disk
Causes the SPARCstorage Array to save the change so it will persist across power-cycles
Enables fast writes for synchronous writes only
textBeforeTable: Table 2-1 Subcommand Support Matrix The following basic luxadm subcommands are supported on the StorEdge A5000 disk array, the SPARCstorage Array, and SPARCstorage RSM trays. See Appendix A, Expert Mode Subcommands for information about export mode subcommands and their supported platforms. Subcommand Support Matrix For information on how to specify (address) a disk array, see "Addressing".
